snippet: A coalition of more than 150 school districts said Tuesday that it had filed a lawsuit against Texas over a funding system it says is unfair, inefficient and unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: A coalition of more than 150 school districts said Tuesday that it had filed a lawsuit against Texas over a funding system it says is unfair, inefficient and unconstitutional.

headline.main: Texas: Schools Sue State Over Budget Cuts
headline.print_headline: Texas: Schools Sue State Over Budget Cuts
